trans-unit.source: Specifies that an attached property is browsable only for elements that derive from a specified type.
trans-unit.target: 指定附加的屬性是可瀏覽，只會針對衍生自指定類型的項目。

trans-unit.source: The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is analogous to the descriptions given for <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>, but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept.
trans-unit.target: 一詞的意義`browsable`會用在此描述[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]類似於提供的描述<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>，附加屬性的可瀏覽狀態是屬性的資訊特別有關係，但[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，附加的屬性主要是因為[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]概念。</xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: If more than one type is specified for a AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], the property is browsable if any specified type matches (logical or).
trans-unit.target: 如果一個以上的型別指定 AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]，屬性是可瀏覽，如果指定任何型別相符項目 (邏輯或)。

trans-unit.source: The type can also be an interface.
trans-unit.target: 型別也可以是介面。

trans-unit.source: This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] specifies <xref:System.AttributeUsageAttribute.AllowMultiple%2A> `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]指定<xref:System.AttributeUsageAttribute.AllowMultiple%2A>`true`。</xref:System.AttributeUsageAttribute.AllowMultiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] should only be applied on the get accessor of attached property definitions.
trans-unit.target: 這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]只會套用在附加的屬性定義的 get 存取子。

trans-unit.source: Do not apply this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] to the set accessor.
trans-unit.target: 不適用這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]set 存取子。

trans-unit.source: Although intuitively it is the set operation that is being made browsable for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] on relevant elements, it is the presence and characteristics of the get accessor on the property defining element that controls the true behavior.
trans-unit.target: 雖然直覺的方式是設定作業是由可瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]相關的項目，它是目前狀態和 get 存取子的屬性定義控制，則為 true 的行為項目上的特性。

trans-unit.source: For general information on declaring attached properties, see [Attached Properties Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需宣告的附加屬性的一般資訊，請參閱[附加屬性概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the provided targetType.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體類別，使用提供 targetType 。

trans-unit.source: The intended type that scopes the use of the attached property where this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] applies.
trans-unit.target: 預定的型別之附加屬性的使用範圍，其中這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]套用。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否目前<xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]是否等於指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: This implementation supports value equality of the one possible settable value exposed by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute.TargetType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會支援這所公開的一個可能可設定值的值相等性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]， <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute.TargetType%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute.TargetType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute"></xref> to compare to the current <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute"> </xref>要與目前比較<xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定<xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute"></xref>是否等於目前<xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個雜湊程式碼<xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: This implementation supports multiple possible hash values based on the one possible settable value exposed by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute.TargetType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作支援多個這所公開的一個可能可設定值為基礎的雜湊值[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]， <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute.TargetType%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute.TargetType%2A>

trans-unit.source: An unsigned 32-bit integer value.
trans-unit.target: 不帶正負號的 32 位元整數值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the base type that scopes the use of the attached property where this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] applies.
trans-unit.target: 取得附加屬性的使用範圍的基底型別其中這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]套用。

trans-unit.source: This property is settable only via the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] declaration as exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是可設定只能透過[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]所公開的宣告<xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute>建構函式。</xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The requested <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: 要求<xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a unique type identifier for this <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 取得這個類型的唯一識別項<xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: This implementation returns a unique value for each [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], which is necessary because this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] allows multiple usages.
trans-unit.target: 這個實作會傳回每個唯一值[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]，這是因為這[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]可讓多個使用方式。

trans-unit.source: An object that is a unique identifier for the <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 物件的唯一識別碼， <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute"> </xref>。
